messages.success: A confirmation email has been sent to your mailbox

firstSlide.title: Welcome to the site of the Digital Model of the city of Innopolis
firstSlide.description: Here you can get the necessary information and suggest ideas for the development of our city. We suggest that you familiarize yourself with the capabilities of the Digital Model or go directly to the interactive map of the city of Innopolis.

secondSlide.title: Find out what objects and services are already in the city
secondSlide.description: All information about social, business and service real estate in one place. You can now choose an institution for lunch, see how many hours a pharmacy is open or find out the area of ​​a kindergarten in one click.

thirdSlide.title: Watch your city change
thirdSlide.description: Visual graphs will show you city changes in various parameters: landscaping, lighting, transport infrastructure and much more. The data is updated in real time.

fourthSlide.title: Understand if the city is green enough
fourthSlide.description: On the city map, we marked each tree, described its properties and determined the city's greening index. Stay tuned for changes in this index and join the tree care.

fifthSlide.title: Explore the city in a convenient way
fifthSlide.description: A motorist, pedestrian or cyclist will find useful information on routes, road signs and crossings here. Feel free to build new routes and explore interesting places.

sixthSlide.title: Dress for the weather
sixthSlide.description: We have placed meteorological sensors around the city, which will show the current weather in Innopolis, as well as draw up a graph of changes in the average temperature.

seventhSlide.title: Change the world around you
seventhSlide.description: Mark problem areas and suggest your ideas for the development of public spaces and the city as a whole.

eighthSlide.title: Discover new places and routes
eighthSlide.description: On an interactive city map, you will find attractions and popular routes near Innopolis. Explore the city and its surroundings using the Digital Model.

ninthSlide.title: Start exploring the city now
ninthSlide.description: Register and change the city with us!

model.title: Digital model of the city of Innopolis
model.caption: A platform aimed at automating tasks in the activities of local governments and organizations that manage urban facilities, as well as creating effective interaction with the residents of Innopolis. The platform provides storage, processing and visualization of data about urban infrastructure objects and provides statistical information about the current state of the city.

inno.title: Innopolis
inno.caption: The first city built in Russia in the 21st century, the infrastructure of which is created from scratch in accordance with the principles of «Smart City». Innopolis aims to make a qualitative change in the situation with a shortage of IT-specialists in Russia. Innopolis is one of the pilot cities selected for integration of solutions in the direction of “Smart city”.
inno.people: people are constantly in the city

service.title: Services for residents and guests of the city
service.subtitle: Services are available for registered users only

estate.title: Estate object
estate.caption: Estate object service allows you to rent or buy an apartment in residential complexes in Innopolis. You can use it to select the apartment you are interested in, view the necessary information about the room, sign a contract and pay for the apartment.

commercialEstate.title: Commercial Real Estate
commercialEstate.caption: With the help of the commercial real estate service, you can rent non-residential premises, namely: choose the room you are interested in, get detailed information about it and the terms of the lease, sign a contract and start a business in Innopolis.

parking.title: Inno-Parking
parking.caption: With the help of the Parking space rental service, you can choose a Parking space for residential complexes in the city of Innopolis, view information about the space and conditions of Parking rental, as well as sign a contract and pay for the lease.

tires.title: Tires and Bicycles Storage
tires.caption: The tire and Bicycle storage service offers you to book your storage space, view information about the space, storage capabilities of your equipment, and no longer worry about the safety of your tires and bicycles.

ideas.title: Ideas and Propositions
ideas.caption: The ideas and suggestions service provides an opportunity to share your ideas and suggestions for improving the city, as well as to get acquainted with current projects of the city. In addition, all residents can evaluate ideas by viewing them on the interactive map of Innopolis.

jobs.title: City Jobs
jobs.caption: The city vacancies service helps non-IT professionals find jobs, ensuring interaction between the service operator, job seekers and employers. Here you can view the Bank of vacancies, post a resume or find a job.
